meta.label: Edit dataset records
meta.description: Webapp to edit records of a dataset and maintain an editlog dataset. A copy of the original dataset is created. A recipe connects all 3 datasets; it allows to replay edits when building the flow.
meta.comments: icon must be one of the FontAwesome 3.2.1 icons, complete list here at https://fontawesome.com/v3.2.1/icons/

params.name: input_dataset
params.label: Dataset
params.description: Original dataset to be copied and made editable by the webapp

params.name: key
params.label: Unique key
params.description: Select a column to use as a unique identifier for rows
